snippet: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits dropped 11,000 to a seasonally adjusted 271,000 for the week ended Dec. 12, the Labor Department said.
abstract: Labor Dept reports initial claims for state unemployment benefits fell 11,000 to seasonally adjusted 271,000 for week ended Dec 12.
lead_paragraph: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits dropped 11,000 to a seasonally adjusted 271,000 for the week ended Dec. 12, the Labor Department said.

headline.print_headline: Job Market Maintains Its Strength, Filings Show
